product_name: Atomic Waymaker Tour 90 Randonee Boots - Men's - 2013/2014
long_description: The Atomic Waymaker Tour 90 randonee boots have the softest flex in the Waymaker Tour line and are the ideal boots for intermediate skiers or those who prefer a softer flexing boot for long tours.
short_description: The Atomic Waymaker Tour 90 randonee boots have the softest flex in the Waymaker Tour line and are the ideal boots for intermediate skiers or those who prefer a softer flexing boot for long tours.
